Replying to @philhawksworth 2018-03-24 10:42
@iainbeeston @Netlify Once deployed your site 'just works' with no need to maintain or patch your environment over time. That has a bunch of benefits like instant rollbacks and multiple branch builds. Including peace of mind for security, performance and maintenance.
  • Permalink
  • Twitter
Replying to @iainbeeston 2018-03-24 10:41
@iainbeeston @Netlify The biggest difference is that @Netlify builds your site and the deploys it statically on the CDN. You don't run a server such as Express, instead the magic happens at build time in our CI.
